heroes.name: hayabusa
heroes.build:
Here is the build for Hayabusa.
This build suggested by <@!331736432957718529> 
Hayabusa is assassin hero which is very capable for ganking and pushing.


<:Raptor_machete:700662865270669333> Core jungling item, Increse stacks as fast as you can.

<:Boots:700662871822041188> Boot for speed and defence, Prioritize this boot before building whole raptor machate.

<:Blade_of_the_7_Seas:700662570515824640> Core ganking item, with the passive you can deal pretty much damage.

<:Endless_Battle:700662581345648700> All round item to give you sustainability.

<:Blade_of_despair:700662581068562475> Increase base and skill damage

<:Queens_Wing:700662699817828412> Increasing HP and lifesteal for late game.

heroes.name: leomord
heroes.build:
Here is the build for leomord.
This build suggested by <@!331736432957718529>

 **Guide** : Leomord is one of the few fighters who can easily counter mm and mages.

I've tried pretty different builds and combos and I found that leomord is good in 2 different builds and both suits for different style users.

I personally uses first role as i'm more efficient as assassin and this role fulfills everything of it while this isn't most played role because most leomord user uses 2nd role. in this mode, you'll prioritise on only 2 things.....jungling excluding jungle (farm your stacks from crab and enemy jungle) and second is aggresive playing with laning and killing. if you planning to use my main build then you need to master this type of play.

<:boots:700662871822041188> use attack speed boot for early game because the faster you reduce enemy hp to 30% the more likely your passive will trigger earlier to deal critical damage.
<:raptor_machete:700662865270669333> the jungling item to give you damage and stacks for extra damage.
<:bloodlust_axe:700662582930833508> the core item for leomord to get massive lifesteal as spell vamp.
<:endless_battle:700662581345648700> to give you sustainability since it'll already about beginning of mid game. the most fierce phase to put pressure on enemy.
<:queens_wing:700662699817828412> for hp and extra lifesteal, specially for countering mm but if enemies are overpowered than skip this and pre buy last item first.
<:blade_of_despair:700662581068562475> the last item yet main item to make leomord op. don't need to stay anything more about power of blade of despair.

**Emblems** : leomord is fine with *assassin* and *fighter* emblem. for first style choose assassin and for second style choose fighter.

**Skills** : the best skills for leomord is *flicker* and *purify* but also *arrival* and *sprint* as well *flameshot* can be used too.
